record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 10 A.M. TOMORROW
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 10 A.M. TOMORROW -- (Senate - September 04, 2007)

[Page: S11082]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if there is no further business to come before the Senate today, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand in adjournment under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 7:20 p.m., adjourned until Wednesday, September 5, 2007, at 10 a.m.
